meanings.definition: A basketball shot made while jumping backwards away from the basket.
meanings.sent1: During the game, he scored with a fadeaway.
meanings.sent2: The player practiced his fadeaway shot for hours.
meanings.sent3: The coach joked that his fadeaway was so good, it made the opponents dizzy.
meanings.sent4: Her fadeaway was like a graceful dance move on the court.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered as he made a perfect fadeaway to win the game.

meanings.definition: To gradually disappear or become less noticeable.
meanings.sent1: The colors of the sunset started to fadeaway.
meanings.sent3: The music slowly fadeaway into silence.
meanings.sent4: Her smile seemed to fadeaway as the conversation turned serious.
meanings.sent5: The old photograph began to fadeaway, losing its clarity.

meanings.definition: A hairstyle where the hair gradually gets shorter towards the back of the head.
meanings.sent1: She decided to try a fadeaway for a new look.
meanings.sent2: The barber specialized in fadeaway cuts.
meanings.sent3: His fadeaway made him look stylish and modern.

meanings.sent5: Her friends complimented her on the trendy fadeaway she got.
